description:
Enter the grim darkness of the far future.
In WARHAMMER 40,000: PARIAH NEXUS (2026), the Imperium faces annihilation as reality itself begins to unravel. This cinematic first look showcases the opening moments of a brutal new Warhammer+ series, where Space Marines, Necron horrors, and cosmic terror collide in a war beyond salvation.

Experience the first 3 minutes of this stunning 4K cinematic, packed with relentless combat, epic scale, and the unmistakable atmosphere of the Warhammer 40K universe.

⚔️ WARHAMMER 40,000: Pariah Nexus Official Trailer (2026) Warhammer+ TV Cinematic First 3 Minutes | 4K

A huge thank you to All of our Channel Members! 
Ya'll really do keep the lights on for us over here.
- The audio claims for our promotional features are getting out of hand.

Enjoy advanced 4K Upscaling and HDR-10 mastering across future trailers. Stay tuned for more.
